title: Ernie Bot, China’s answer to ChatGPT, is delayed — again
description: Baidu's Ernie Bot is not being rolled out to the public. But we found Ernie Bot shuts down the conversation when asked about anything remotely sensitive.

title: Now you can ‘buy now, pay later’ with Apple Wallet
description: iPhone users can request loans from Apple to "buy now, pay later" and repay in four installments over six weeks with no interest.

title: AI doesn’t belong everywhere. Stop using a hammer to make lasagna.
description: Just because you can apply AI to a task, it doesn't mean that you should.

title: Microsoft’s latest use for GPT4: Stopping hackers
description: Microsoft has been putting generative AI into many of its products. Now it's adding cybersecurity tools to the list.

title: Water in video games has never looked wetter. Er, better.
description: Video games don't simulate water. They create an illusion — one that needs to work right in “about five thousandths of a second.”

title: Congress had a lot to say about TikTok. Much of it was wrong.
description: ‘Nyquil chicken’ and the ‘blackout challenge’ were phenomena before TikTok existed.

title: Apple illegally fired five labor activists, union says
description: The workers, who were disciplined and fired for attendance-related issues, believe they were let go because of their union organizing.

title: Biden stuck between China hawks, young voters as TikTok pressure mounts
description: The administration faces national security concerns over the app’s ownership — and a possible backlash over a ban.
